example.eg: Annie is browsing in the clothing department.  "Can I help you?" "No thanks. I'm just browsing."
example.egtrans: 安妮在逛女装。 “我能帮你吗？” “不，谢谢。我只是随便看看。”

trans_examp.trans_cn: 浏览, 到处看, 逛逛

example.eg: Arnold smiled as he browsed through his old high school yearbook.
example.egtrans: 阿诺德翻阅着高中的年册，露出了微笑。

example.eg: It's easy to waste time browsing online.
example.egtrans: 上网浏览网页很容易浪费时间。

example.eg: Ronald enjoys browsing the internet for science articles in his free time.
example.egtrans: 罗纳德喜欢在空闲的时候浏览科学文章。

example.eg: She stopped for a quick browse through the antique store.
example.egtrans: 她停下了脚步，四处浏览古董店。

dsense.name: browse
dsense.guideword: (twigs, etc. that animals eat) (动物吃的)

example.eg: The woods are filled with plenty of low-growing vegetation, providing deer and other animals with ample browse.
Deer were browsing in the meadow.
The herd of goats browsed on grass and twigs in the pasture.
